mapper.sql: id, ltime, devno, acode, acontent, cid, palletid, memo, detail, palletcode,companyId
mapper.select: select l.* ,p.* from t_asrs_log_devalarm l left join t_web_project p on l.projectid = p.id where l.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(*) as num,z.company from t_asrs_log_devalarm l left join t_web_zuhu z on l.companyid = z.id where l.devno = #{devno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by companyid
mapper.insert: insert into t_asrs_log_devalarm (id, ltime, devno, acode, acontent, cid, palletid, memo, detail, palletcode,companyId) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), #{devno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{palletid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{palletcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into t_asrs_log_devalarm
id,
now(),
devno,
acode,
acontent,
cid,
palletid,
memo,
detail,
palletcode,

mapper.update:
update t_asrs_log_devalarm
ltime = #{ltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
devno = #{devno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
acode = #{acode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
acontent = #{acontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cid = #{cid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
palletid = #{palletid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
palletcode = #{palletcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companyid = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_asrs_log_devalarm set ltime = #{ltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, devno = #{devno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, acode = #{acode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, acontent = #{acontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cid = #{cid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, palletid = #{palletid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, palletcode = #{palletcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
